## Epic Summary

One-line summary of the epic and outcome.

## Success Criteria
- Metric(s) and acceptance criteria (measurable).

## Stakeholders
- Product, Engineering, Security, Ops

## Dependencies
- Other epics or external systems

## Risks
- Top 3 risks and mitigations

## Suggested Stories
- Link to child issues (stories/tasks)
